io.s4.zeno
Class SiteRegistry

java.lang.Object
  io.s4.zeno.SiteRegistry

public class SiteRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of named services, counters, locks, and monitors. Allows services to be started and stopped together.

Constructor Detail

SiteRegistry

public SiteRegistry()
Method Detail

startServices

public void startServices()
Start all registered services. The services are started in the order of registration.

stopServices

public void stopServices()
Stop all services. The services are stopped in the reverse order of registration.

registerService

public boolean registerService(java.lang.String name,
                               Service service)
Register a service. Note that services will be started in the order in which they are registered; they will be stopped in the reverse of this order. The registry must be in the stopped state, and the name must not be already registered.

Parameters:
name - name to use for the Service
service - the Service to register.
Returns:
true if successfully registered.

deregisterService

public Service deregisterService(java.lang.String name)
Deregister a service from the registry. The registry must be stopped first.

Parameters:
name - name of the Service0 to remove from the registry.
Returns:
reference to the Service0 that was removed. null if the name was not found or the registry is in started state.

lookupService

public Service lookupService(java.lang.String name)
Lookup a Service given a name.

Parameters:
name - name of the service.
Returns:
Service corresponding to name. null if not found.

lock

public void lock(java.lang.String name)
Obtain a named lock. This method blocks.

Parameters:
name - name of the lock to be obtained.

tryLock

public boolean tryLock(java.lang.String name)
Try to obtain a named lock. This function returns immediately.

Parameters:
name - name of the lock to be obtained.
Returns:
true if the lock was obtained. False otherwise.

unlock

public void unlock(java.lang.String name)
Release a named lock.

Parameters:
name - name of the lock to be released.

lockAndRun

public void lockAndRun(java.lang.String l,
                       java.lang.Runnable r)
Obtain a lock and run the specified action. Then unlock. This method blocks till the lock has been obtained.

Parameters:
l - name of the lock to be obtained
r - action to be run.

tryLockAndRun

public boolean tryLockAndRun(java.lang.String l,
                             java.lang.Runnable r)
Try to obtain a lock and run the specified action. Unlocks when done. If the lock is not free to be obtained when this method is called, then the action is not performed and the method returns immediately. For a blocking version, use lockAndRun(String, Runnable).

Parameters:
l - name of the lock to be obtained.
r - action to run.
Returns:
true if and only if the action was run.

getCount

public int getCount(java.lang.String name)
Get count from a named counter.

Parameters:
name - name of counter.

setCount

public int setCount(java.lang.String name,
                    int count)
Set count of a named counter, getting previously held value.

Parameters:
name - name of counter
count - value to set to counter.
Returns:
previously held value.

addCount

public int addCount(java.lang.String name,
                    int delta)
Add an integer to a counter, getting previously held value.

Parameters:
name - name of counter.
delta - value to add. Use a negative value for decrementing.
Returns:
previously held value.

getActivityMonitor

public ActivityMonitor getActivityMonitor(java.lang.String name)
